mapper.select: select p.person_id as PERSON_ID, p.name as NAME, p.id_number as ID_NUMBER, dc.dic_name as SEX, p.birthday as BIRTHDAY, p.bsflag as BSFLAG from oil_personnel_information p join type_dic_conver dc on p.sex = dc.source_type

select p.person_id as PERSON_ID, p.name as NAME, p.id_number as ID_NUMBER, dc.dic_name as SEX, p.birthday as BIRTHDAY, p.bsflag as BSFLAG from oil_personnel_information p join type_dic_conver dc on p.sex = dc.source_type
